Border Radio
14 Dec 2007
You can't pay to hear it anymore
Even if you wanted to
And you can't hear it on the radio
-
Turn it on, tune on it
It will bring you to your knees and into sin
Blasting birds right out of the say
That border radio
DJs are afraid
